The relief of suffering, supporting complex decision making, and managing clinical uncertainty are key attributes of palliative care and essential components of the response to epidemics and pandemics.
1 The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic is escalating rapidly across the globe. Those affected experience symptoms including breathlessness, cough, myalgia, and fever. The mortality risk is especially high among those with existing illness and multimorbidity.
